name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WACart : Cart Recovery + CMS for Shopify

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows shopify admin orders send pre-defined msg and access order details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the shopify admin to send predefined orders and abandoned cart messages to the customers.

What Can You Do With WACart : Cart Recovery + CMS for Shopify?
Check all your customer lists directly using this extension.
Check customer's orders and abandoned cart history.
Option to send predefined order confirm or shipped / fulfillment messages to customers.
Admin also views the customer's order tracking details by clicking on the order tracking number.
On the abandoned cart option, you can send messages to the customers who abandoned/left your cart.
Option to search the customers by id, name, or phone number.
Option to set order date, custom order date functionality.

How to Get Started
Add this extension to your browser.
Press the extension icon.
Follow the instructions to use it on your computer.
Use your store login id and password to login into this extension.
Now you are ready to use this extension.
